properties.name: io.lvdaxianer.upload.file.enabled-type
properties.description: 文件存储类型：disk（本地磁盘）或 mino（MinIO对象存储）

properties.name: io.lvdaxianer.upload.file.save-dir
properties.description: 文件保存目录，当 enabled-type 为 disk 时必填

properties.name: io.lvdaxianer.upload.file.log-level
properties.description: 日志级别：DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR，默认 INFO

properties.name: io.lvdaxianer.upload.file.detailed-logging
properties.description: 是否启用详细日志，启用后会输出更详细的操作信息

properties.name: io.lvdaxianer.upload.file.thread-sleep-time
properties.description: 线程休眠时间，用于等待更多文件上传
